text:
"Disney's House of Mouse" is a animated television series from The Walt Disney Company. It was on television from 2001 to 2002. In the television show Mickey Mouse and his friends have a dinner theater called the "House of Mouse" in downtown Toontown. It features many different Disney characters together. It has a Halloween special where the villains take over the theater for themselves and a Christmas special.
